entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JwtSecurityTokenHandler token expiration date validation fails if date more than 25 years #63001
  • .NET 6.0.1 coreclr.dll symbols unavailable #62998
  • JsonSerializer.SerializeToElement has wrong XML documentation #62993

Closed

  • how can I make .dll file generated same when rebuild solution if no source code change? #62987

PullRequests

Created

  • Superpmi.py: Detect changes in jiteeversionguid.h #63000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Various WASM AOT changes #62997
  • Expose AppContext.SetData in ref assembly #62996
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve XML documentation #62994
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution

Merged

  • Implement the "moffset" encoding size optimization in `emitOutputAM` #62896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove small casts on the RHS of `ASG(CLS_VAR)` #62693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1520507 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Simplify alignment block marking #62940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #62989
    area-System.Text.Json
  • NativeAOT: Do not run Vector version of Hardware Intrinsics when AVX2… #62951
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fixed typo in remarks section of OnCompleted #62982
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
